mods.abstract: Image of a table with a sign labelled "Women's Books" on it, surrounded by chairs and various standing people. Books on the table include "Psyche," "Feminism and Socialism," "Rebel in Paradise," "Growing Up Female in America," "The Feminist Papers," "Revolutionary Dynamics of Women's Liberation," and "The Autobiography of Mother Jones."
mods.note: "Feb 19 1985" is written on the back of the photograph.
mods.accessCondition: Digital copy created for preservation and access purposes. Available by request for research purposes only. All other uses must be cleared by patron through copyright holders. For further details contact ascproj@yorku.ca
